item.title: How to Clear Cookies for a Specific Site with One Click?
item.author: rayspock@protonmail.com (rayspock)
item.description: It’s bothering me to clear the Cookies for the website that I’m visiting. Because it comes with several steps to use the built-in feature that chrome provides to clear them. Besides, most of the Chrome Extension will clear all the website data and you will lose login detail for some websites. If you got lucky you would be fine with sign-in. But the truth is people (at least for me) won’t always remember the username/password when needed.
